trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around July 4th 2009
Summary: saw 6 ufo's that were red-ish orange color
divs: Sighting Detailsit was the fourth of july. the first ufo we didnt think anything of. we thought i was a fire work that never went out. then another one came... the party and i thought perhaps it was a plane. then we saw another!!! i knew it was something strange. so then i started getting scared... it started to settle down these all didnt come at once. it was about a 15 minute duration between each ufo. the scariest one was thee last... there were 3 ufo's. all the same as described above, but in a perfect triangle. they just glided across the sky. were we all scared and weirded out...a ll it did was glide across the sky. we lost sight of it because it just glided across until we couldnt see it no more
